wikipedia_page.main: John Douglas Robson (20 July 1942 – 23 April 2020) was an English footballer who made 33 appearances in the Football League playing as a centre half for Darlington in the 1960s. He also played non-League football for Gateshead and Horden Colliery Welfare.

response: *Doug Robson (John Douglas Robson) (1942–2020), English footballer for Darlington
* Doug Robson (1942–2020), born John Douglas Robson and listed as John Robson in some databases, English football centre half for Darlington
